DocumentationDefinitionList.Title: Roles - root OU rules
DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: Roles available only in the root OU

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The root administrator has all permissions in OpenCms. This user automatically has all other roles, having the rights of these roles. The predefined user Admin is root administrator. The role is important and at least the Admin user should have this role.
